## Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you would like to see.

## Motivation

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve? How does it improve the Eigenvue experience?

A clear and concise description of how you envision this feature working.

## Alternatives Considered

Describe any alternative solutions or features you have considered and why they were not sufficient.

Add any other context, mockups, or references about the feature request here.
